mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User (UserName, PWD, RealName, Question, Answer) VALUES (#{UserName}, #{PWD}, #{RealName}, #{Question}, #{Answer})
INSERT INTO Team (TeamName, Auth, Leader, Objective) VALUES (#{TeamName}, #{Auth}, #{Leader}, #{Objective})
INSERT INTO Invite (FromUID, ToUID, LinkedTID) VALUES (#{FromUID}, #{ToUID}, #{LinkedTID})
INSERT INTO Todo (Objective, AddUID, DoUID, IsEnd) VALUES (#{Objective}, #{AddUID}, #{DoUID}, #{IsEnd})
